required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Adherence to Exclusive Enteral Nutrition in Patients With Crohn's Disease
clinical_study.official_title: Adherence to Exclusive Enteral Nutrition in Patients With Crohn's Disease

lead_sponsor.agency: Second Affiliated Hospital, School of Medicine, Zhejiang University

clinical_study.source: Second Affiliated Hospital, School of Medicine, Zhejiang University

brief_summary.textblock: The study has not yet been completed

primary_outcome.description: The adherence of patients was evaluated by the ratio of daily actual intake of energy to daily target energy.

study_pop.textblock: We investigated CD patients who received EEN therapy in tertiary hospital in Hangzhou from December 2020 to May 2021.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- The main inclusion criteria were as follows: had diagnosed CD more than 3 months; had EEN in the past 6 months; were at least 18 years old; agreed to participate in this study.
Exclusion Criteria:
- The exclusion criteria were received treatment from mental health professionals due to any mental or cognitive impairment; suffered from other serious diseases, such as heart, brain, lung, liver and kidney dysfunction; severe infection, anemia, cachexia or other serious complications were found.

overall_official.affiliation: 2ndAffiliated Hospital, School of Medicine, Zhejiang University, China

facility.name: 2ndAffiliated Hospital, School of Medicine, Zhejiang University, China

clinical_study.keyword: Crohn's disease, Exclusive Enteral Nutrition, Adherence
